# thermalStateDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

Posts when the thermal state of the system changes.

## Declaration

```swift
class let thermalStateDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification object is a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo] instance.

To receive [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/thermalStateDidChangeNotification], you must access the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/thermalState-swift.property] prior to registering for the notification.

## Notifications

- **NSProcessInfoPowerStateDidChange**: Posts when the power state of a device changes.
